AD_EntityType.Help: Localizacion Colombia incluye las modificaciones necesarias en materia de impuestos para Colombia, manejo de retenciones de IVA, ICA y ReteFte, reporte de medios magnéticos para la DIAN, generación/validación del dígito de verificación del NIT. Desarrollado por http://globalqss.com
AD_EntityType.Name: Localizacion Colombia

AD_Message.MsgText: Write-Off Amount must be equal or greater than Withholdings

AD_Message_Trl.MsgText: El valor del ajuste debe ser mayor o igual que las retenciones

AD_Val_Rule.Code: NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM C_TaxCategory WHERE C_TaxCategory.C_TaxCategory_ID=C_Tax.C_TaxCategory_ID AND IsWithholding='Y')
AD_Val_Rule.Name: LCO_Not Withholding Taxes

AD_Column.Help: A Client is a company or a legal entity. You cannot share data between Clients. Tenant is a synonym for Client.
AD_Column.Name: Client

AD_Column.Help: The Updated By field indicates the user who updated this record.
AD_Column.Name: Updated By

AD_Column.Help: The Invoice Document.
AD_Column.Name: Invoice

AD_Val_Rule.Code: C_Tax.C_Tax_ID IN (SELECT C_Tax_ID FROM LCO_WithholdingCalc WHERE LCO_WithholdingType_ID = @LCO_WithholdingType_ID@)
AD_Val_Rule.Name: LCO_Taxes From Withholding Type

AD_Column.Help: The Tax indicates the type of tax used in document line.
AD_Column.Name: Tax

AD_Column.Help: The Created field indicates the date that this record was created.
AD_Column.Name: Created

AD_Column.Help: The Created By field indicates the user who created this record.
AD_Column.Name: Created By

AD_Column.Help: The Accounting Date indicates the date to be used on the General Ledger account entries generated from this document. It is also used for any currency conversion.
AD_Column.Name: Account Date

AD_Column.Help: The Transaction Date indicates the date of the transaction.
AD_Column.Name: Transaction Date

AD_Column.Description: The record is active in the system
AD_Column.Help: There are two methods of making records unavailable in the system: One is to delete the record, the other is to de-activate the record. A de-activated record is not available for selection, but available for reports. There are two reasons for de-activating and not deleting records: (1) The system requires the record for audit purposes. (2) The record is referenced by other records. E.g., you cannot delete a Business Partner, if there are invoices for this partner record existing. You de-activate the Business Partner and prevent that this record is used for future entries.
AD_Column.Name: Active

AD_Column.Description: Tax is included in the price
AD_Column.Help: The Tax Included checkbox indicates if the prices include tax. This is also known as the gross price.
AD_Column.Name: Price includes Tax

AD_Column.Help: The Percent indicates the percentage used.
AD_Column.Name: Percent

AD_Column.Help: The Processed checkbox indicates that a document has been processed.
AD_Column.Name: Processed

AD_Column.Help: The Tax Amount displays the total tax amount for a document.
AD_Column.Name: Tax Amount

AD_Column.Description: Base for calculating the tax amount
AD_Column.Help: The Tax Base Amount indicates the base amount used for calculating the tax amount.
AD_Column.Name: Tax base Amount

AD_Column.Help: The Updated field indicates the date that this record was updated.
AD_Column.Name: Updated

AD_Column.Help: An organization is a unit of your client or legal entity - examples are store, department. You can share data between organizations.
AD_Column.Name: Organization

AD_Column.Help: Allocation of Cash/Payment to Invoice
AD_Column.Name: Allocation Line

AD_Column.Description: Optional short description of the record
AD_Column.Help: A description is limited to 255 characters.
AD_Column.Name: Description

AD_Column.Description: Document sequence number of the document
AD_Column.Help:
The document number is usually automatically generated by the system and determined by the document type of the document. If the document is not saved, the preliminary number is displayed in "<>".
If the document type of your document has no automatic document sequence defined, the field is empty if you create a new document. This is for documents which usually have an external number (like vendor invoice). If you leave the field empty, the system will generate a document number for you. The document sequence used for this fallback number is defined in the "Maintain Sequence" window with the name "DocumentNo_<TableName>", where TableName is the actual name of the table (e.g. C_Order).
AD_Column.Name: Document No

AD_Tab.CommitWarning: Please take account that changes on Withholding will be lost if you change invoice lines after making this change.
AD_Tab.Name: Withholding

AD_Tab_Trl.CommitWarning: Please take account that changes on Withholding will be lost if you change invoice lines after making this change.
AD_Tab_Trl.Name: Retención

AD_Field.Help: A Client is a company or a legal entity. You cannot share data between Clients. Tenant is a synonym for Client.
AD_Field.Name: Client

AD_Field_Trl.Help: Grupo Empresarial. No se pueden compartir datos entre diferentes grupos empresariales.
AD_Field_Trl.Name: Grupo Empresarial

AD_Field.Help: An organization is a unit of your client or legal entity - examples are store, department. You can share data between organizations.
AD_Field.Name: Organization

AD_Field_Trl.Description: Entidad organizacional dentro del grupo empresarial
AD_Field_Trl.Help: Una organización es una unidad del grupo empresarial o entidad legal - Ej. Tiendas y departamentos. Es posible compartir datos entre organizaciones.
AD_Field_Trl.Name: Organización

AD_Field.Help: The Invoice Document.
AD_Field.Name: Invoice

AD_Field_Trl.Help: La ID de Factura identifica únicamente un documento de Factura.
AD_Field_Trl.Name: Factura

AD_Field.Help: The Tax indicates the type of tax used in document line.
AD_Field.Name: Tax

AD_Field_Trl.Help: El Impuesto indica el tipo de impuesto para esta línea del documento
AD_Field_Trl.Name: Impuesto

AD_Field.Help: The Percent indicates the percentage used.
AD_Field.Name: Percent

AD_Field_Trl.Help: El porcentaje indica el porcentaje usado para retención.
AD_Field_Trl.Name: Porcentaje

AD_Field.Description: Base for calculating the tax amount
AD_Field.Help: The Tax Base Amount indicates the base amount used for calculating the tax amount.
AD_Field.Name: Tax base Amount

AD_Field_Trl.Description: Base para calcular el total del impuesto
AD_Field_Trl.Help: El total base de impuesto indica el total base usado para calcular el total de impuesto.
AD_Field_Trl.Name: Total Base del Impuesto

AD_Field.Help: The Tax Amount displays the total tax amount for a document.
AD_Field.Name: Tax Amount

AD_Field_Trl.Description: Total del impuesto para un documento
AD_Field_Trl.Help: El Total de Impuesto despliega el total de impuesto para un documento
AD_Field_Trl.Name: Total del Impuesto

AD_Field.Help: The Transaction Date indicates the date of the transaction.
AD_Field.Name: Transaction Date

AD_Field_Trl.Help: La fecha de transacción indica la fecha en que se ejecutó la transacción
AD_Field_Trl.Name: Fecha Transacción

AD_Field.Help: The Accounting Date indicates the date to be used on the General Ledger account entries generated from this document. It is also used for any currency conversion.
AD_Field.Name: Account Date

AD_Field_Trl.Help: La fecha contable indica la fecha a ser usada en las cuentas de contabilidad general generadas desde este documento
AD_Field_Trl.Name: Fecha Contable

AD_Field.Help: The Processed checkbox indicates that a document has been processed.
AD_Field.Name: Processed

AD_Field_Trl.Help: El cuadro de verificación procesada indica que un documento ha sido procesado
AD_Field_Trl.Name: Procesado

AD_Field.Description: The record is active in the system
AD_Field.Help: There are two methods of making records unavailable in the system: One is to delete the record, the other is to de-activate the record. A de-activated record is not available for selection, but available for reports. There are two reasons for de-activating and not deleting records: (1) The system requires the record for audit purposes. (2) The record is referenced by other records. E.g., you cannot delete a Business Partner, if there are invoices for this partner record existing. You de-activate the Business Partner and prevent that this record is used for future entries.
AD_Field.Name: Active

AD_Field_Trl.Description: El registro está activo en el sistema
AD_Field_Trl.Help: Hay dos métodos para que los registros no estén disponibles en el sistema: Uno es eliminar el registro; el otro es desactivarlo. Un registro desactivado no está disponible para selección; pero está disponible para Informes
AD_Field_Trl.Name: Activo

AD_Field.Description: Document sequence number of the document
AD_Field.Help:
The document number is usually automatically generated by the system and determined by the document type of the document. If the document is not saved, the preliminary number is displayed in "<>".
If the document type of your document has no automatic document sequence defined, the field is empty if you create a new document. This is for documents which usually have an external number (like vendor invoice). If you leave the field empty, the system will generate a document number for you. The document sequence used for this fallback number is defined in the "Maintain Sequence" window with the name "DocumentNo_<TableName>", where TableName is the actual name of the table (e.g. C_Order).
AD_Field.Name: Document No

AD_Field_Trl.Description: Número de secuencia del documento para cada documento
AD_Field_Trl.Help:
El número del documento es usualmente generado en automático por el sistema y determinado por el tipo del documento. Si el documento no se salva; el número preliminar se despliega entre El número del documento es usualmente generado en automático por el sistema y determinado por el tipo del documento. Si el documento no se salva; el número preliminar se despliega entre "<>".
Si el tipo de documento de su documento no tiene secuencia automatica definida, el campo está vacío si usted crea un nuevo doc. Esto es para documentos los cuales usualmente tiene un número externo (Como factura de proveedor). Si usted deja este campo vacío, el sistema generará un número de doc para usted.
AD_Field_Trl.Name: No. del Documento

AD_Field.Help: A description is limited to 255 characters.
AD_Field.Name: Description

AD_Field_Trl.Help: Una descripción esta limitada a 255 caracteres
AD_Field_Trl.Name: Descripción

AD_Field_Trl.Name: Impuesto Incluido en el Precio

AD_Field_Trl.Description: El registro está activo en el sistema
AD_Field_Trl.Help: Hay dos métodos para que los registros no estén disponibles en el sistema: Uno es eliminar el registro; el otro es desactivarlo. Un registro desactivado no está disponible para selección; pero está disponible para Informes
AD_Field_Trl.Name: Activo

AD_Field.Description: Document sequence number of the document
AD_Field.Help:
The document number is usually automatically generated by the system and determined by the document type of the document. If the document is not saved, the preliminary number is displayed in "<>".
If the document type of your document has no automatic document sequence defined, the field is empty if you create a new document. This is for documents which usually have an external number (like vendor invoice). If you leave the field empty, the system will generate a document number for you. The document sequence used for this fallback number is defined in the "Maintain Sequence" window with the name "DocumentNo_<TableName>", where TableName is the actual name of the table (e.g. C_Order).
AD_Field.Name: Document No

AD_Field_Trl.Description: Número de secuencia del documento para cada documento
AD_Field_Trl.Help:
El número del documento es usualmente generado en automático por el sistema y determinado por el tipo del documento. Si el documento no se salva; el número preliminar se despliega entre El número del documento es usualmente generado en automático por el sistema y determinado por el tipo del documento. Si el documento no se salva; el número preliminar se despliega entre "<>".
Si el tipo de documento de su documento no tiene secuencia automatica definida, el campo está vacío si usted crea un nuevo doc. Esto es para documentos los cuales usualmente tiene un número externo (Como factura de proveedor). Si usted deja este campo vacío, el sistema generará un número de doc para usted.
AD_Field_Trl.Name: No. del Documento

AD_Field.Help: Allocation of Cash/Payment to Invoice
AD_Field.Name: Allocation Line

AD_Field_Trl.Help: Asignación de Efectivo/Pagos a facturas
AD_Field_Trl.Name: Línea de Asignación

AD_Field.Description: Optional short description of the record
AD_Field.Help: A description is limited to 255 characters.
AD_Field.Name: Description

AD_Field_Trl.Help: Una descripción esta limitada a 255 caracteres
AD_Field_Trl.Name: Descripción

AD_Field.Description: Tax is included in the price
AD_Field.Help: The Tax Included checkbox indicates if the prices include tax. This is also known as the gross price.
AD_Field.Name: Price includes Tax

AD_Field_Trl.Help: El cuadro de verificación Impuesto Incluido indica que el precio incluye impuestos. Esto es también conocido como el precio bruto
AD_Field_Trl.Name: Impuesto Incluido en el Precio

AD_Column.Help: A Client is a company or a legal entity. You cannot share data between Clients. Tenant is a synonym for Client.
AD_Column.Name: Client

AD_Column.Help: An organization is a unit of your client or legal entity - examples are store, department. You can share data between organizations.
AD_Column.Name: Organization

AD_Column.Help: Number counter
AD_Column.Name: Counter

AD_Column.Help: The Created field indicates the date that this record was created.
AD_Column.Name: Created

AD_Column.Help: The Created By field indicates the user who created this record.
AD_Column.Name: Created By

AD_Column.Help: The Updated By field indicates the user who updated this record.
AD_Column.Name: Updated By

AD_Column.Description: The record is active in the system
AD_Column.Help: There are two methods of making records unavailable in the system: One is to delete the record, the other is to de-activate the record. A de-activated record is not available for selection, but available for reports. There are two reasons for de-activating and not deleting records: (1) The system requires the record for audit purposes. (2) The record is referenced by other records. E.g., you cannot delete a Business Partner, if there are invoices for this partner record existing. You de-activate the Business Partner and prevent that this record is used for future entries.
AD_Column.Name: Active

AD_Column.Help: The Sales Transaction checkbox indicates if this item is a Sales Transaction.
AD_Column.Name: Sales Transaction

AD_Column.Help: A description is limited to 255 characters.
AD_Column.Name: Description

AD_Column.Name: Updated

AD_Column.Help: The name of an entity (record) is used as an default search option in addition to the search key. The name is up to 60 characters in length.
AD_Column.Name: Name

AD_Field.Description: Document sequence number of the document
AD_Field.Help:
The document number is usually automatically generated by the system and determined by the document type of the document. If the document is not saved, the preliminary number is displayed in "<>".
If the document type of your document has no automatic document sequence defined, the field is empty if you create a new document. This is for documents which usually have an external number (like vendor invoice). If you leave the field empty, the system will generate a document number for you. The document sequence used for this fallback number is defined in the "Maintain Sequence" window with the name "DocumentNo_<TableName>", where TableName is the actual name of the table (e.g. C_Order).
AD_Field.Name: Document No

AD_Field_Trl.Description: Número de secuencia del documento para cada documento
AD_Field_Trl.Help:
El número del documento es usualmente generado en automático por el sistema y determinado por el tipo del documento. Si el documento no se salva; el número preliminar se despliega entre El número del documento es usualmente generado en automático por el sistema y determinado por el tipo del documento. Si el documento no se salva; el número preliminar se despliega entre "<>".
Si el tipo de documento de su documento no tiene secuencia automatica definida, el campo está vacío si usted crea un nuevo doc. Esto es para documentos los cuales usualmente tiene un número externo (Como factura de proveedor). Si usted deja este campo vacío, el sistema generará un número de doc para usted.
AD_Field_Trl.Name: No. del Documento

AD_Field_Trl.Name: Línea de Asignación

AD_Field.Description: Optional short description of the record
AD_Field.Help: A description is limited to 255 characters.
AD_Field.Name: Description

AD_Field_Trl.Help: Una descripción esta limitada a 255 caracteres
AD_Field_Trl.Name: Descripción

AD_Field.Description: Tax is included in the price
AD_Field.Help: The Tax Included checkbox indicates if the prices include tax. This is also known as the gross price.
AD_Field.Name: Price includes Tax

AD_Field_Trl.Help: El cuadro de verificación Impuesto Incluido indica que el precio incluye impuestos. Esto es también conocido como el precio bruto
AD_Field_Trl.Name: Impuesto Incluido en el Precio

AD_Column.Help: A Client is a company or a legal entity. You cannot share data between Clients. Tenant is a synonym for Client.
AD_Column.Name: Client

AD_Column.Help: An organization is a unit of your client or legal entity - examples are store, department. You can share data between organizations.
AD_Column.Name: Organization

AD_Column.Help: The Created field indicates the date that this record was created.
AD_Column.Name: Created

AD_Column.Help: The Created By field indicates the user who created this record.
AD_Column.Name: Created By

AD_Column.Description: Optional short description of the record
AD_Column.Help: A description is limited to 255 characters.
AD_Column.Name: Description

AD_Column.Help: The Updated By field indicates the user who updated this record.
AD_Column.Name: Updated By

AD_Column.Help: The Default Checkbox indicates if this record will be used as a default value.
AD_Column.Name: Default

AD_Column.Description: The record is active in the system
AD_Column.Help: There are two methods of making records unavailable in the system: One is to delete the record, the other is to de-activate the record. A de-activated record is not available for selection, but available for reports. There are two reasons for de-activating and not deleting records: (1) The system requires the record for audit purposes. (2) The record is referenced by other records. E.g., you cannot delete a Business Partner, if there are invoices for this partner record existing. You de-activate the Business Partner and prevent that this record is used for future entries.
AD_Column.Name: Active

AD_Column.Help: The Updated field indicates the date that this record was updated.
AD_Column.Name: Updated

AD_Column.Help: The name of an entity (record) is used as an default search option in addition to the search key. The name is up to 60 characters in length.
AD_Column.Name: Name

AD_Field.Help: A Client is a company or a legal entity. You cannot share data between Clients. Tenant is a synonym for Client.
AD_Field.Name: Client

AD_Field_Trl.Help: Grupo Empresarial. No se pueden compartir datos entre diferentes grupos empresariales.
AD_Field_Trl.Name: Grupo Empresarial

AD_Field.Help: An organization is a unit of your client or legal entity - examples are store, department. You can share data between organizations.
AD_Field.Name: Organization

AD_Field_Trl.Description: Entidad organizacional dentro del grupo empresarial
AD_Field_Trl.Help: Una organización es una unidad del grupo empresarial o entidad legal - Ej. Tiendas y departamentos. Es posible compartir datos entre organizaciones.
AD_Field_Trl.Name: Organización

AD_Field.Help: The name of an entity (record) is used as an default search option in addition to the search key. The name is up to 60 characters in length.
AD_Field.Name: Name

AD_Field_Trl.Help: El nombre de una entidad (registro) se usa como una opción de búsqueda predeterminada adicional al código. El nombre es de hasta 60 caracteres de longitud.
AD_Field_Trl.Name: Nombre

AD_Field.Description: Optional short description of the record
AD_Field.Help: A description is limited to 255 characters.
AD_Field.Name: Description

AD_Field_Trl.Help: Una descripción esta limitada a 255 caracteres
AD_Field_Trl.Name: Descripción

AD_Field.Help: The Default Checkbox indicates if this record will be used as a default value.
AD_Field.Name: Default

AD_Field_Trl.Help: El cuadro de verificación indica si este registro será usado como un valor predeterminado
AD_Field_Trl.Name: Predeterminado

AD_Field.Description: The record is active in the system
AD_Field.Help: There are two methods of making records unavailable in the system: One is to delete the record, the other is to de-activate the record. A de-activated record is not available for selection, but available for reports. There are two reasons for de-activating and not deleting records: (1) The system requires the record for audit purposes. (2) The record is referenced by other records. E.g., you cannot delete a Business Partner, if there are invoices for this partner record existing. You de-activate the Business Partner and prevent that this record is used for future entries.
AD_Field.Name: Active

AD_Field_Trl.Description: El registro está activo en el sistema
AD_Field_Trl.Help: Hay dos métodos para que los registros no estén disponibles en el sistema: Uno es eliminar el registro; el otro es desactivarlo. Un registro desactivado no está disponible para selección; pero está disponible para Informes
AD_Field_Trl.Name: Activo

AD_Column.Help: A Client is a company or a legal entity. You cannot share data between Clients. Tenant is a synonym for Client.
AD_Column.Name: Client

AD_Column.Help: An organization is a unit of your client or legal entity - examples are store, department. You can share data between organizations.

AD_Column.Description: The record is active in the system
AD_Column.Help: There are two methods of making records unavailable in the system: One is to delete the record, the other is to de-activate the record. A de-activated record is not available for selection, but available for reports. There are two reasons for de-activating and not deleting records: (1) The system requires the record for audit purposes. (2) The record is referenced by other records. E.g., you cannot delete a Business Partner, if there are invoices for this partner record existing. You de-activate the Business Partner and prevent that this record is used for future entries.
AD_Column.Name: Active

AD_Column.Description: Search key for the record in the format required - must be unique
AD_Column.Help: A search key allows you a fast method of finding a particular record. If you leave the search key empty, the system automatically creates a numeric number. The document sequence used for this fallback number is defined in the "Maintain Sequence" window with the name "DocumentNo_<TableName>", where TableName is the actual name of the table (e.g. C_Order).
AD_Column.Name: Search Key

AD_Column.Help: A summary entity represents a branch in a tree rather than an end-node. Summary entities are used for reporting and do not have own values.
AD_Column.Name: Summary Level

AD_Column.Help: The Default Checkbox indicates if this record will be used as a default value.
AD_Column.Name: Default

AD_Column.Help: The Updated field indicates the date that this record was updated.
AD_Column.Name: Updated

AD_Column.Help: The Updated By field indicates the user who updated this record.
AD_Column.Name: Updated By

AD_Column.Help: The name of an entity (record) is used as an default search option in addition to the search key. The name is up to 60 characters in length.
AD_Column.Name: Name

AD_Field.Description: Search key for the record in the format required - must be unique
AD_Field.Help: A search key allows you a fast method of finding a particular record. If you leave the search key empty, the system automatically creates a numeric number. AD_Field_Trl.Description: Código para el registro en el formato requerido; debe ser único
AD_Field_Trl.Help: Un código le permite a usted un método rápido de encontrar un registro en particular
AD_Field_Trl.Name: Código

AD_Field_Trl.Name: Descripción

AD_Field.Help: A summary entity represents a branch in a tree rather than an end-node. Summary entities are used for reporting and do not have own values.
AD_Field.Name: Summary Level

AD_Field_Trl.Help: Una entidad sumaria representa una rama en un árbol mas bien que un nodo final. Las entidades sumarias son usadas para reportar y no tienen valores propios
AD_Field_Trl.Name: Entidad Acumulada
